explainability_template: When you cast {X}, {effect}. Cards that increase cast count or copy spells amplify this.
notes: Generic contract template for cast engines

explainability_template: When you sacrifice {X}, {effect}. Cards that create sacrifice events or fodder amplify this.
notes: Generic contract template for aristocrats shells

explainability_template: Ashling grants Evoke to Elemental spells cast from your hand; alternate-cost casting still counts as casting.
notes: Evoke grant is a cast-modifier contract with subtype restriction

explainability_template: Sacrificing a nontoken Elemental creates a hasty token copy and schedules a next-end-step sacrifice unless you pay.
notes: This contract produces a temporary resource that can be amplified or have its downside removed.
